result.title: Invitation to the Weekly Programming Contest 2015 by IIT Kanpur on CodeChef
result.content:
CodeChef invites you to participate in the Weekly Programming Contest 2015 by IIT Kanpur.

Time: 21st January 2015 (1900 hrs) to 22nd January 2015(0000 hrs). (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone here

Details: http://www.codechef.com/WPC1501/

Registration: Just need to have a CodeChef user id to participate.

New users please register here

It promises to deliver on an interesting set of algorithmic problems with something for all. It is your chance to have a crack at those problems.
The contest is open for all and those, who are interested, are requested to have a CodeChef userid, in order to participate.
